title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil water in a large pot with salt.
Cook spaghetti until al dente.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Beat eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Combine pasta with pancetta, remove from heat, and mix in egg mixture quickly.
Serve with extra pepper and cheese.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Grill or fry chicken until cooked.
Saut√© onions in a pan until soft.
Add tomato puree and simmer.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken.
Simmer for 10 minutes and garnish with coriander.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir fry with fresh vegetables and a savory sauce.
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat sesame oil in a wok or large pan.
Stir fry ginger and garlic for 30 seconds.
Add vegetables and stir fry for 5-7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and toss to coat.
Serve hot over rice or noodles.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Crispy or soft tortilla shells filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
instructions: Brown ground beef in a skillet.
Drain fat and add taco seasoning with water as per packet instructions.
Simmer until sauce thickens.
Warm taco shells in the oven.
Fill shells with beef and top with cheese, lettuce, salsa, and sour cream.
